96 TF_TestStrm::TF_TestStrm( BRDCHAR* fname, CL_AMBPEX *fotr )
97 {
98  lc_status=0;
99 
100  Terminate=0;
101  BlockRd=0;
102  BlockOk=0;
103  BlockError=0;
104  TotalError=0;
105 
106  pBrd=fotr;
107  bufIsvi=NULL;
108 
109  SetDefault();
110  GetParamFromFile( fname );
111  CalculateParams();
112 
113  m_RowNumberMgt=0;
114 
115  cntRestart=0;
116 
117  fileNumber=0;
118  FileBufferCurrent=0;
119  DiskBufferCurrent=0;
120 
121  isFirstCallStep=true;
122 
123  rd0.testBuf.buf_check_start( 32, 64 );
124 
125  m_sWriteFileName[0]=0;
126  currentTime=0;
127  rd0.time_start=0;
128 
129  m_EventCheck0Start = CreateEvent( NULL, FALSE, FALSE, NULL );
130  m_EventCheck0Result = CreateEvent( NULL, FALSE, FALSE, NULL );
131 
132  m_EventCheck1Start = CreateEvent( NULL, FALSE, FALSE, NULL );
133  m_EventCheck1Result = CreateEvent( NULL, FALSE, FALSE, NULL );
134 
135  m_EventCheck2Start = CreateEvent( NULL, FALSE, FALSE, NULL );
136  m_EventCheck2Result = CreateEvent( NULL, FALSE, FALSE, NULL );
137 
138  m_EventCheck3Start = CreateEvent( NULL, FALSE, FALSE, NULL );
139  m_EventCheck3Result = CreateEvent( NULL, FALSE, FALSE, NULL );
140 
141  m_pFDSP=NULL;
142 
143  m_TimeBlockIndex=0;
144 
145  isCheckSdramWrVelocity=1;
146  SdramWrVelocity=0;
147  SdramTimeWr=0;
148 }

150 TF_TestStrm::~TF_TestStrm()
151 {
152  pBrd->StreamDestroy( rd0.Strm );
153  //delete bufIsvi; bufIsvi=NULL;
154 
155  CloseHandle( m_EventCheck0Start );
156  CloseHandle( m_EventCheck0Result );
157 
158  CloseHandle( m_EventCheck1Start );
159  CloseHandle( m_EventCheck1Result );
160 
161  CloseHandle( m_EventCheck2Start );
162  CloseHandle( m_EventCheck2Result );
163 
164  CloseHandle( m_EventCheck3Start );
165  CloseHandle( m_EventCheck3Result );
166 }
167 
168 void TF_TestStrm::Prepare( void )
169 {
170 
171  PrepareAdm();
172 
173  rd0.trd=trdNo;
174  rd0.Strm=strmNo;
175  pBrd->StreamInit( rd0.Strm, CntBuffer, SizeBuferOfBytes, rd0.trd, 1, isCycle, isSystem, isAgreeMode );
176 
177  for( int blk=0; blk<CntBuffer; blk++ )
178  {
179  U32 *ptr=pBrd->StreamGetBufByNum( rd0.Strm, blk );
180  for( int ii=0; ii<SizeBlockOfWords; ii++ )
181  *ptr++=0xAAAAAAAA;
182 
183  }
184 
185  bufIsvi = new U32[SizeBlockOfWords*2];
186  //pBrd->StreamInit( strm, CntBuffer, SizeBuferOfBytes, rd0.trd, 1, 0, 0 );
187 }
188 
189 void TF_TestStrm::Start( void )
190 {
191  int ii;
192  U32 ret;
193 
194  m_RowNumber = AddRowTable();
195 
196  if( isFdspMgtCheck )
197  {
198  m_RowNumberMgt = AddRowTable();
199  }
200 
201  if( isFdspCheckReg )
202  m_RowNumberReg = AddRowTable();
203 
204  if( isFdspShowMgtErr )
205  {
206  m_RowLcErr = AddRowTable();
207  m_RowRmErr = AddRowTable();
208  }
209 
210  if( isFdspSysmon )
211  {
212  m_RowNumberSysmon = AddRowTable();
213  }
214 
215  if( isSdram0Test )
216  {
217  m_RowNumberSdram0 = AddRowTable();
218  }
219 
220  if( isSdram1Test )
221  {
222  m_RowNumberSdram1 = AddRowTable();
223  }
224 
225  if( m_isCheckCompletion )
226  {
227  m_RowCompletion = AddRowTable();
228  }
229 
230  hThread = (HANDLE)_beginthreadex( NULL, 0, ThreadFunc, this, CREATE_SUSPENDED, &ThreadId );
231  if(hThread == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE){
232  hThread = 0;
233  }
234 
235  // SetThreadAffinityMask( hThread, 1 );
236  SetThreadPriority( hThread, THREAD_PRIORITY_HIGHEST );
237 
238  hThreadIsvi = (HANDLE)_beginthreadex( NULL, 0, ThreadFuncIsvi, this, CREATE_SUSPENDED, &ThreadIdIsvi );
239  if(hThreadIsvi == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE){
240  hThreadIsvi = 0;
241  }
242 
243  // SetThreadAffinityMask( hThread, 1 );
244  SetThreadPriority( hThreadIsvi, THREAD_PRIORITY_ABOVE_NORMAL );
245 
246  hThreadCheck0 = (HANDLE)_beginthreadex( NULL, 0, ThreadFuncCheck0, this, CREATE_SUSPENDED, &ThreadIdCheck0 );
247  if(hThreadCheck0 == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE){
248  hThreadCheck0 = 0;
249  }
250 
251 
252  hThreadCheck1 = (HANDLE)_beginthreadex( NULL, 0, ThreadFuncCheck1, this, CREATE_SUSPENDED, &ThreadIdCheck1 );
253  if(hThreadCheck1 == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE){
254  hThreadCheck1 = 0;
255  }
256 
257  hThreadCheck2 = (HANDLE)_beginthreadex( NULL, 0, ThreadFuncCheck2, this, CREATE_SUSPENDED, &ThreadIdCheck2 );
258  if(hThreadCheck2 == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE){
259  hThreadCheck2 = 0;
260  }
261 
262  hThreadCheck3 = (HANDLE)_beginthreadex( NULL, 0, ThreadFuncCheck3, this, CREATE_SUSPENDED, &ThreadIdCheck3 );
263  if(hThreadCheck3 == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE){
264  hThreadCheck3 = 0;
265  }
266 
267  // SetThreadAffinityMask( hThread, 1 );
268  SetThreadPriority( hThreadCheck1, THREAD_PRIORITY_HIGHEST );
269  SetThreadPriority( hThreadCheck2, THREAD_PRIORITY_HIGHEST );
270  SetThreadPriority( hThreadCheck3, THREAD_PRIORITY_HIGHEST );
271 
272  Sleep( 200 );
273 
274  ResumeThread( hThreadIsvi );
275  ResumeThread( hThread );
276  ResumeThread( hThreadCheck0 );
277  ResumeThread( hThreadCheck1 );
278  ResumeThread( hThreadCheck2 );
279  ResumeThread( hThreadCheck3 );
280 
281 }
282 
283 void TF_TestStrm::Stop( void )
284 {
285  //printf( "\n\n### %s\n\n", __FUNCTION__ );
286  lc_status=3;
287  Terminate=1;
288 
289  pBrd->RegPokeInd( rd0.trd, 0, 0 );
290  if( isTestCtrl )
291  { // остановка тетрады TestCtrl
292  pBrd->RegPokeInd( 1, 0x1E, 0 );
293  pBrd->RegPokeInd( 1, 0x1C, 0 );
294  }
295 
296 
297 }
298 
299 void TF_TestStrm::Step( void )
300 {
301  static int step_cnt=0;
302  /*
303  pkg_in.testBuf.check_result( &pkg_in.BlockOk , &pkg_in.BlockError, NULL, NULL, NULL );
304  rd0.testBuf.check_result( &rd0.BlockOk , &rd0.BlockError, NULL, NULL, NULL );
305  rd1.testBuf.check_result( &rd1.BlockOk , &rd1.BlockError, NULL, NULL, NULL );
306  */
307 
308  rd0.testBuf.check_result( &rd0.BlockOk , &rd0.BlockError, NULL, NULL, NULL );
309 
310  //BRDC_printf( "%10s %10d %10d %10d %10d\n", "PACKAGE :", pkg_out.BlockWr, pkg_in.BlockRd, pkg_in.BlockOk, pkg_in.BlockError );
311  //BRDC_printf( "%10s %10d %10d %10d %10d\n", "FIFO_0 :", tr0.BlockWr, rd0.BlockRd, rd0.BlockOk, rd0.BlockError );
312  //BRDC_printf( "%10s %10d %10d %10d %10d\n", "FIFO_1 :", tr1.BlockWr, rd1.BlockRd, rd1.BlockOk, rd1.BlockError );
313 
314  U32 trd=rd0.trd;
315  U32 status = pBrd->RegPeekDir( trd, 0 ) & 0xFFFF;
316 
317 
318  if( isTestCtrl )
319  {
320  U32 cnt_low = pBrd->RegPeekInd( 1, 0x21A ) & 0xFFFF;
321  U32 cnt_high = pBrd->RegPeekInd( 1, 0x21B ) & 0xFFFF;
322  rd0.BlockWr = (cnt_high << 16) | cnt_low;
323  }
324 
325  //BRDC_printf( _BRDC("%6s %3d %10d %10d %10d %10d %9.1f %10.1f 0x%.4X %d %d %d %d %10d %10d \n"), _BRDC("TRD :"), rd0.trd, rd0.BlockWr, rd0.BlockRd, rd0.BlockOk, rd0.BlockError, rd0.VelocityCurrent, rd0.VelocityAvarage, status,
326  // Ch0CntError, Ch1CntError, Ch2CntError, Ch3CntError, DiskBufferCurrent, FileBufferCurrent);
327 
328 
329  U32 cnt_rd=rd0.BlockRd;
330  if( isRestart )
331  cnt_rd = cntRestart;
332 
333  U32 adcOvr=0;
334  adcOvr=pBrd->RegPeekInd( 4, 0x208 );
335 
336  //SetValueTable( m_RowNumber, 0, rd0.trd );
337  char tname[256];
338  sprintf( tname, "TRD%d", rd0.trd );
339  SetValueTable( m_RowNumber, 0, tname );
340  SetValueTable( m_RowNumber, 1, rd0.BlockWr );
341  SetValueTable( m_RowNumber, 2, cnt_rd );
342  SetValueTable( m_RowNumber, 3, rd0.BlockOk );
343  SetValueTable( m_RowNumber, 4, rd0.BlockError );
344  SetValueTable( m_RowNumber, 5, rd0.VelocityCurrent, "%10.1f" );
345  SetValueTable( m_RowNumber, 6, rd0.VelocityAvarage, "%10.1f" );
346  SetValueTable( m_RowNumber, 7, status, " 0x%.4X" );
347 
348  U32 lc_status=0, rm_status=0;
349  if( m_pFDSP )
350  {
351  m_pFDSP->GetStatus( lc_status, rm_status );
352  } else
353  {
354  U32 low = pBrd->RegPeekInd( 5, 0x20C );
355  U32 high = pBrd->RegPeekInd( 5, 0x20D );
356  lc_status = (low & 0xFFFF) | (high<<16);
357  rm_status=0;
358  }
359  sprintf( tname, "%.8X %.2X %.2X", lc_status, rm_status, adcOvr );
360  SetValueTable( m_RowNumber, 8, tname );
361 
362 
363  // Проверка скорости записи
364  if( 1==isCheckSdramWrVelocity )
365  {
366  if( 0==SdramFifoMode && (status&0x2000) )
367  {
368  U32 low = pBrd->RegPeekInd( 5, 0x20C );
369  U32 high = pBrd->RegPeekInd( 5, 0x20D );
370  U32 cnt = (low & 0xFFFF) | (high<<16);
371  double wr_time = cnt * 0.00000001; // TODOD: 100 MHz - надо уметь задавать частоту␀ double wr_velocity = 1.0 * SdramAzSizeOfKb / 1024 / wr_time; SdramWrVelocity = wr_velocity; SdramTimeWr=wr_time; isCheckSdramWrVelocity=2; // скорость измерена } } if( isFdspMgtCheck && 0==Terminate ) { U32 row=m_RowNumberMgt; GetTestCurrent( &mgt, 0x3E2 ); sprintf( tname, "FDSP_MGT" ); SetValueTable( row, 0, tname ); SetValueTable( row, 1, mgt.BlockWr ); SetValueTable( row, 2, mgt.BlockRd ); SetValueTable( row, 3, mgt.BlockOk ); SetValueTable( row, 4, mgt.BlockError ); SetValueTable( row, 5, mgt.VelocityCurrent, "%10.1f" ); SetValueTable( row, 6, mgt.VelocityAvarage, "%10.1f" ); SetValueTable( row, 7, "" ); SetValueTable( row, 8, "" ); } if( isFdspCheckReg ) { m_pFDSP->CheckStep(); U32 block_ok, block_error, total_error; m_pFDSP->CheckResult( block_ok, block_error, total_error, NULL ); status = pBrd->RegPeekDir( 8, 0 ) & 0xFFFF; sprintf( tname, "DSP REG" ); SetValueTable( m_RowNumberReg, 0, tname ); SetValueTable( m_RowNumberReg, 1, "" ); SetValueTable( m_RowNumberReg, 2, "" ); SetValueTable( m_RowNumberReg, 3, block_ok ); SetValueTable( m_RowNumberReg, 4, block_error ); SetValueTable( m_RowNumberReg, 5, "" ); SetValueTable( m_RowNumberReg, 6, "" ); SetValueTable( m_RowNumberReg, 7, status, " 0x%.4X" ); SetValueTable( m_RowNumberReg, 8, "" ); } if( isFdspShowMgtErr ) { if( 0==step_cnt ) { U32 lc_err[8]; U32 rm_err[8]; m_pFDSP->GetMgtErr( lc_err, rm_err ); sprintf( tname, "LC ERR" ); SetValueTable( m_RowLcErr, 0, tname ); sprintf( tname, "RM ERR" ); SetValueTable( m_RowRmErr, 0, tname ); for( int ii=0; ii<8; ii++ ) { SetValueTable( m_RowLcErr, ii+1, lc_err[ii] ); SetValueTable( m_RowRmErr, ii+1, rm_err[ii] ); } } step_cnt++; if( 10==step_cnt ) step_cnt=0; } if( isFdspSysmon ) { U32 stat; float temp; m_pFDSP->GetSysmon( stat, temp ); status = pBrd->RegPeekDir( 8, 0 ) & 0xFFFF; sprintf( tname, "SYSMON" ); SetValueTable( m_RowNumberSysmon, 0, tname ); SetValueTable( m_RowNumberSysmon, 1, temp, " %4.1f" ); SetValueTable( m_RowNumberSysmon, 2, stat, "0x%.2X" ); SetValueTable( m_RowNumberSysmon, 3, "" ); SetValueTable( m_RowNumberSysmon, 4, "" ); SetValueTable( m_RowNumberSysmon, 5, "" ); SetValueTable( m_RowNumberSysmon, 6, "" ); SetValueTable( m_RowNumberSysmon, 7, status, " 0x%.4X" ); SetValueTable( m_RowNumberSysmon, 8, "" ); } if( isSdram0Test ) { U32 row=m_RowNumberSdram0; GetTestCurrent( &sdram0, 0x3C2 ); sprintf( tname, "SODIMM 0" ); SetValueTable( row, 0, tname ); SetValueTable( row, 1, sdram0.BlockWr ); SetValueTable( row, 2, sdram0.BlockRd ); SetValueTable( row, 3, sdram0.BlockOk ); SetValueTable( row, 4, sdram0.BlockError ); SetValueTable( row, 5, sdram0.VelocityCurrent, "%10.1f" ); SetValueTable( row, 6, sdram0.VelocityAvarage, "%10.1f" ); SetValueTable( row, 7, status, " 0x%.4X" ); SetValueTable( row, 8, "" ); } if( isSdram1Test ) { U32 row=m_RowNumberSdram1; GetTestCurrent( &sdram1, 0x3D2 ); sprintf( tname, "SODIMM 1" ); SetValueTable( row, 0, tname ); SetValueTable( row, 1, sdram1.BlockWr ); SetValueTable( row, 2, sdram1.BlockRd ); SetValueTable( row, 3, sdram1.BlockOk ); SetValueTable( row, 4, sdram1.BlockError ); SetValueTable( row, 5, sdram1.VelocityCurrent, "%10.1f" ); SetValueTable( row, 6, sdram1.VelocityAvarage, "%10.1f" ); SetValueTable( row, 7, status, " 0x%.4X" ); SetValueTable( row, 8, "" ); } if( m_isCheckCompletion ) { U32 row=m_RowCompletion; U32 block4_0x12 = pBrd->BlockRegRead( 4, 0x12 ); U32 block4_0x13 = pBrd->BlockRegRead( 4, 0x13 ); U32 block5_0x12 = pBrd->BlockRegRead( 4, 0x12 ); U32 block5_0x13 = pBrd->BlockRegRead( 4, 0x13 ); sprintf( tname, "Completion" ); SetValueTable( row, 0, tname ); SetValueTable( row, 1, block4_0x12, "0x%.8X" ); SetValueTable( row, 2, block4_0x13, "0x%.8X" ); SetValueTable( row, 3, block5_0x12, "0x%.8X" ); SetValueTable( row, 4, block5_0x13, "0x%.8X" ); SetValueTable( row, 5, "" ); SetValueTable( row, 6, "" ); SetValueTable( row, 7, "" ); SetValueTable( row, 8, "" ); } U32 hour, min, sec; U32 _min, _sec; _sec = (currentTime - rd0.time_start) / 1000; sec = _sec%60; _min = _sec/60; min = _min %60; hour = _min / 60; double _size = rd0.BlockRd; _size *= SizeBlockOfBytes; _size /=1024; // kB _size /=1024; // Mb _size /=1024; // Gb } int TF_TestStrm::isComplete( void ) { //if( (lc_status==4) && (IsviStatus==100) ) if( lc_status==4 ) { printf( "\n\nisComplete() - exit\n\n" ); return 1; } return 0; } void TF_TestStrm::GetResult( void ) { //if(pkg_in.BlockRd!=0 && pkg_in.BlockError!=0) // BRDC_printf("%s\n", pkg_in.testBuf.report_word_error()); //U32 velocity = rd0.VelocityAvarage; //velocity *= 8; double velocity = rd0.VelocityAvarage; velocity *= 8; velocity /= 1024; if( 2==isCheckSdramWrVelocity ) { BRDC_printf( _BRDC( "Время записи в DDR: %10.3f с\n" ), SdramTimeWr ); BRDC_printf( _BRDC( "Скорость записи в DDR: %10.3f МБайт/с\n\n" ), SdramWrVelocity ); } if( (rd0.BlockRd!=0 || 0!=isRestart) && rd0.BlockError!=0) { BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\n\nПроверка завершена. \n") ); //BRDC_printf( _BRDC("Скорость передачи: %d Мбит/с ( %10.1f Мбайт/с ) \n"), velocity, rd0.VelocityAvarage ); //BRDC_printf( _BRDC("Скорость передачи: %10.4g Гбит/с ( %10.1f Мбайт/с ) \n"), velocity, rd0.VelocityAvarage ); BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\n\nERROR: Число ошибок: %d\n"), rd0.TotalError ); switch( isTest ) { case 6: // 128 BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\nСписок ошибок 0: \n") ); //BRDC_printf(_BRDC("%s\n"), rd0.testBuf.report_word_error()); printf( "%s\n", rd0.testBuf.report_word_error(0) ); BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\nСписок ошибок 1: \n") ); //BRDC_printf(_BRDC("%s\n"), rd0.testBuf.report_word_error()); printf( "%s\n", rd0.testBuf.report_word_error(1) ); break; case 7: case 8: //case 9: { BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\nСписок ошибок 0: \n") ); //BRDC_printf(_BRDC("%s\n"), rd0.testBuf.report_word_error()); printf( "%s\n", rd0.testBuf.report_word_error(0) ); BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\nСписок ошибок 1: \n") ); //BRDC_printf(_BRDC("%s\n"), rd0.testBuf.report_word_error()); printf( "%s\n", rd0.testBuf.report_word_error(1) ); BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\nСписок ошибок 2: \n") ); //BRDC_printf(_BRDC("%s\n"), rd0.testBuf.report_word_error()); printf( "%s\n", rd0.testBuf.report_word_error(2) ); BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\nСписок ошибок 3: \n") ); //BRDC_printf(_BRDC("%s\n"), rd0.testBuf.report_word_error()); printf( "%s\n", rd0.testBuf.report_word_error(3) ); }; break; default: BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\nСписок ошибок: \n") ); // rd0.TotalError //BRDC_printf(_BRDC("%s\n"), rd0.testBuf.report_word_error()); printf( "%s\n", rd0.testBuf.report_word_error() ); break; } BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\n Press any key\n") ); getch(); } else if( (rd0.BlockRd==0) && (0==isRestart) ) { BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\n\nERROR: Данные не приняты \n") ); BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\n\nПроверка завершена с ошибками \n") ); } else { BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\n\nПроверка завершена. Ошибок нет \n") ); //BRDC_printf( _BRDC("Скорость передачи: %d Мбит/с ( %10.1f Мбайт/с ) \n"), velocity, rd0.VelocityAvarage ); //BRDC_printf( _BRDC("Скорость передачи: %10.4g Гбит/с ( %10.1f Мбайт/с ) \n"), velocity, rd0.VelocityAvarage ); } if( isSdram0Test ) { if( 0==sdram0.BlockError && sdram0.BlockRd!=0 ) { BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\n\nSODIMM 0 - Ошибок нет \n") ); } else if( 0==sdram0.BlockRd ) { BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\n\nERROR: SODIMM 0 - Данные не приняты \n") ); } else { BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\n\nERROR: Ошибка тестирования SODIMM 0 \n") ); BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\n\nSODIMM 0 - Список ошибок: \n") ); GetTestResult( 0x3C2 ); BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\n\n") ); } } if( isSdram1Test ) { if( 0==sdram1.BlockError && sdram1.BlockRd!=0 ) { BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\n\nSODIMM 1 - Ошибок нет \n") ); } else if( 0==sdram1.BlockRd ) { BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\n\nERROR: SODIMM 1 - Данные не приняты \n") ); } else { BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\n\nERROR: Ошибка тестирования SODIMM 1 \n") ); BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\n\nSODIMM 1 - Список ошибок: \n") ); GetTestResult( 0x3D2 ); BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\n\n") ); } } if( isFdspMgtCheck ) { if( 0==mgt.BlockError && mgt.BlockRd!=0 ) { BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\n\nFDSP_MGT - Ошибок нет \n") ); } else if( 0==mgt.BlockRd ) { BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\n\nERROR: FDSP_MGT - Данные не приняты \n") ); } else { BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\n\nERROR: Ошибка тестирования FDSP_MGT \n") ); BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\n\nFDSP_MGT - Список ошибок: \n") ); GetTestResult( 0x3E2 ); BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\n\n") ); } } //// Вывод времени приёма блоков //BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\n\nВремя приёма блоков\n") ); //U32 prev_time = m_TimeBlockStart; //for( int ii=0; ii<m_TimeBlockIndex; ii++ ) //{ // U32 rc_time = m_TimeBlockReceive[ii] - m_TimeBlockStart; // U32 interval= m_TimeBlockReceive[ii] - prev_time; // BRDC_printf( _BRDC( " %2d %10d %10d\n"), ii, rc_time, interval ); // prev_time = m_TimeBlockReceive[ii]; //} // BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\n\n") ); } UINT WINAPI TF_TestStrm::ThreadFunc( LPVOID lpvThreadParm ) { TF_TestStrm *test=(TF_TestStrm*)lpvThreadParm; UINT ret; if( !test ) return 0; ret=test->Execute(); return ret; } UINT WINAPI TF_TestStrm::ThreadFuncIsvi( LPVOID lpvThreadParm ) { TF_TestStrm *test=(TF_TestStrm*)lpvThreadParm; UINT ret; if( !test ) return 0; Sleep( 200 ); ret=test->ExecuteIsvi(); return ret; } UINT WINAPI TF_TestStrm::ThreadFuncCheck0( LPVOID lpvThreadParm ) { TF_TestStrm *test=(TF_TestStrm*)lpvThreadParm; UINT ret; if( !test ) return 0; ret=test->ExecuteCheck0(); return ret; } UINT WINAPI TF_TestStrm::ThreadFuncCheck1( LPVOID lpvThreadParm ) { TF_TestStrm *test=(TF_TestStrm*)lpvThreadParm; UINT ret; if( !test ) return 0; ret=test->ExecuteCheck1(); return ret; } UINT WINAPI TF_TestStrm::ThreadFuncCheck2( LPVOID lpvThreadParm ) { TF_TestStrm *test=(TF_TestStrm*)lpvThreadParm; UINT ret; if( !test ) return 0; ret=test->ExecuteCheck2(); return ret; } UINT WINAPI TF_TestStrm::ThreadFuncCheck3( LPVOID lpvThreadParm ) { TF_TestStrm *test=(TF_TestStrm*)lpvThreadParm; UINT ret; if( !test ) return 0; ret=test->ExecuteCheck3(); return ret; } //! Установка параметров по умолчанию void TF_TestStrm::SetDefault( void ) { int ii=0; array_cfg[ii++]=STR_CFG( 0, "isShowParam", "0", (U32*)&isShowParam, "1 - отображение параметров" ); array_cfg[ii++]=STR_CFG( 0, "CntBuffer", "16", (U32*)&CntBuffer, "число буферов стрима" ); array_cfg[ii++]=STR_CFG( 0, "CntBlockInBuffer", "512", (U32*)&CntBlockInBuffer, "Число блоков в буфере" ); array_cfg[ii++]=STR_CFG( 0, "SizeBlockOfWords", "2048", (U32*)&SizeBlockOfWords, "Размер блока в словах" ); array_cfg[ii++]=STR_CFG( 0, "isCycle", "1", (U32*)&isCycle, "1 - Циклический режим работы стрима" ); array_cfg[ii++]=STR_CFG( 0, "isRestart", "0", (U32*)&isRestart, "1 - Перезапуск АЦП" ); array_cfg[ii++]=STR_CFG( 0, "isSystem", "0", (U32*)&isSystem, "1 - выделение системной памяти" ); array_cfg[ii++]=STR_CFG( 0, "isAgreeMode", "0", (U32*)&isAgreeMode, "1 - согласованный режим" ); array_cfg[ii++]=STR_CFG( 0, "trdNo", "4", (U32*)&trdNo, "Номер тетрады" ); array_cfg[ii++]=STR_CFG( 0, "strmNo", "0", (U32*)&strmNo, "Номер стрма" ); array_cfg[ii++]=STR_CFG( 0, "isSdram", "0", (U32*)&isSdram, "1 - тетрада SDRAM" ); array_cfg[ii++]=STR_CFG( 0, "SdramSource", "0", (U32*)&SdramSource, "Источник данных для SDRAM: 0 - АЦП, 1 - FDSP" ); array_cfg[ii++]=STR_CFG( 0, "SdramTestSequence", "0", (U32*)&SdramTestSequence, "0x100 - включение 256-ти разрядной тестовой последовательности на входе SDRAM" ); array_cfg[ii++]=STR_CFG( 0, "SdramFullSpeed", "0", (U32*)&SdramFullSpeed, "1 - включение работы на полной скорости, требует установки SdramTestSequence=0x100" ); array_cfg[ii++]=STR_CFG( 0, "SdramFifoMode", "0", (U32*)&SdramFifoMode, "1 - режим FIFO" ); array_cfg[ii++]=STR_CFG( 0, "SdramFifoOutRestart", "0", (U32*)&SdramFifoOutRestart, " 1 - перезапуск только выходного FIFO тетрады TRD_DDR3x" ); array_cfg[ii++]=STR_CFG( 0, "SdramAzBase", "0", (U32*)&SdramAzBase, "Начало активной зоны.
