3712  BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\r %4d %d # LC: %.2X RM: %.2X # 0x%.4X 0x%.4X 0x%.4X 0x%.4X 0x%.4X"), ii, ret, lc_status, rm_status,
3713  reg2D0, reg2D1, reg2D2, reg2D3, reg2D4 );
3714  if( kbhit() )
3715  {
3716 
3717  getch();
3718  break;
3719  }
3720  }
3721 
3722 
3723  m_pFDSP->SetPrsMode( isAdmCh0Prs, isAdmCh1Prs, isFdspCh0Prs, isFdspCh1Prs );
3724 
3725  BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\n\n Связь установлена␀n\n") ); m_pFDSP->ShowInfo(); m_pFDSP->ShowCalcInfo(); } //! Получение одного слова из памяти результата U32 TF_TestStrm::GetTestCurrentItem( U32 adr, U32 reg ) { U32 adr_r=adr+1; U32 d, dx, d0, d1, ii; for( ii=0; ii<100; ii++ ) { pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, adr, reg ); d0=pBrd->RegPeekInd( 8, adr_r ) & 0xFFFF;; pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, adr, reg+1 ); d1=pBrd->RegPeekInd( 8, adr_r ) & 0xFFFF;; d=(d1<<16) | d0; pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, adr, reg ); d0=pBrd->RegPeekInd( 8, adr_r ) & 0xFFFF;; pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, adr, reg+1); d1=pBrd->RegPeekInd( 8, adr_r ) & 0xFFFF;; dx=(d1<<16) | d0; if( d==dx ) break; } return dx; } //! Текущие результаты тестирования SDRAM void TF_TestStrm::GetTestCurrent( ParamExchange *p, U32 adr ) { p->BlockRd=GetTestCurrentItem( adr, 0x4000 ); p->BlockOk=GetTestCurrentItem( adr, 0x4002 ); p->BlockError=GetTestCurrentItem( adr, 0x4004 ); p->BlockWr=GetTestCurrentItem( adr, 0x4006 ); } //! Запуск теста SDRAM void TF_TestStrm::Sdram0Start( void ) { pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, 0x3C6, 0 ); U32 size = m_pFDSP->GetSodimmSize( 0 ); pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, 0x3C7, size ); //pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, 0x3C7, 4 ); // 1 - 1 Гбайт, 2 - 2 Гбайта pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, 0x3C4, 0 ); // 1 - 1 Гбайт, 2 - 2 Гбайта pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, 0x3C5, 0 ); // 1 - 1 Гбайт, 2 - 2 Гбайта pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, 0x3C0, 0x01 ); Sleep( 1 ); pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, 0x3C0, 0x00 ); Sleep( 1 ); pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, 0x3C0, 0x01 ); Sleep( 1 ); pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, 0x3C0, 0x00 ); Sleep( 1 ); pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, 0x3C0, 0x30 ); } //! Запуск теста SDRAM void TF_TestStrm::Sdram1Start( void ) { pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, 0x3D6, 0 ); U32 size = m_pFDSP->GetSodimmSize( 1 ); pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, 0x3D7, size ); //pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, 0x3D7, 1 ); // 1 - 1 Гбайт, 2 - 2 Гбайта pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, 0x3D4, 0 ); pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, 0x3D5, 0 ); // 1 - 1 Гбайт, 2 - 2 Гбайта pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, 0x3D0, 0x01 ); Sleep( 1 ); pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, 0x3D0, 0x00 ); Sleep( 1 ); pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, 0x3D0, 0x01 ); Sleep( 1 ); pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, 0x3D0, 0x00 ); Sleep( 1 ); pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, 0x3D0, 0x30 ); } //! Получение результатов теста void TF_TestStrm::GetTestResult( U32 adr ) { BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\nСписок ошибок 0: \n") ); GetTestResultChn( adr, 0 ); BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\nСписок ошибок 1: \n") ); GetTestResultChn( adr, 1 ); BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\nСписок ошибок 2: \n") ); GetTestResultChn( adr, 2 ); BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\nСписок ошибок 3: \n") ); GetTestResultChn( adr, 3 ); } //! Получение результатов теста void TF_TestStrm::GetTestResultChn( U32 adr, U32 chn ) { U32 base=chn*0x1000; U32 total_err; total_err=GetTestCurrentItem( adr, base+0x100 ); U32 cnt=total_err; if( cnt>16 ) cnt=16; U32 ii; U32 word; for( ii=0; ii<cnt; ii++ ) { word=base+ii*0x10; unsigned __int64 data_rd, data_expect, tmp; U32 index, block; data_rd = GetTestCurrentItem( adr, word+0 ); tmp =GetTestCurrentItem( adr, word+2 ); data_rd |= tmp << 32; data_expect = GetTestCurrentItem( adr, word+4 ); tmp =GetTestCurrentItem( adr, word+6 ); data_expect |= tmp << 32; index = GetTestCurrentItem( adr, word+8 ) & 0xFFFF; block = GetTestCurrentItem( adr, word+9 ); tmp = data_expect ^ data_rd; printf( "ERROR: %4d block: %-4d index: %.8X expect: %.16I64X receive: %.16I64X xor: %.16I64X \r\n", ii, block, index, data_expect, data_rd, tmp ); } } //! Подготовка FM214x250M void TF_TestStrm::PrepareAdc( char* fname ) { U32 atr; BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\nФайл инициализации АЦП: ") ); printf( "%s \n", fname ); char srvName[210]; char srvName1[210]; srvName[0]=0; { // Определение имени службы АЦП FILE *in = fopen( fname, "rt" ); if( NULL==in ) { throw( _BRDC("Ошибка при открытии файла") ); } char str[512]; for( ; ; ) { if( fgets( str, 200, in )==NULL ) break; if( strncmp( "AdcServiceName=", str, 15 )==0 ) { sscanf( str+15, "%s", srvName ); break; } } sprintf( srvName1, "%s0", srvName ); } #ifdef UNICODE BRDCHAR _srvName[512]; BRDCHAR _srvName1[512]; MultiByteToWideChar( CP_ACP, // __in UINT CodePage, MB_PRECOMPOSED, // __in DWORD dwFlags, srvName, // __in LPCSTR lpMultiByteStr, -1, // __in int cbMultiByte, _srvName, // __out LPWSTR lpWideCharStr, 512 // __in int cchWideChar ); MultiByteToWideChar( CP_ACP, // __in UINT CodePage, MB_PRECOMPOSED, // __in DWORD dwFlags, srvName1, // __in LPCSTR lpMultiByteStr, -1, // __in int cbMultiByte, _srvName1, // __out LPWSTR lpWideCharStr, 512 // __in int cchWideChar ); m_hAdc=pBrd->GetSrvHandle( _srvName1, &atr ); #else m_hAdc=pBrd->GetSrvHandle( srvName1, &atr ); #endif BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\n#####Служба АЦП: %s %.8X \n"), srvName1, m_hAdc ); //m_hAdc=pBrd->GetSrvHandle( _BRDC("FM214X250M0"), &atr ); if( !m_hAdc ) { throw( _BRDC("Служба АЦП не найдена ") ); } BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\nСлужба АЦП: %.8X \n"), m_hAdc ); if( NULL==fname ) { throw( _BRDC( "Не задано имя файла инициализации АЦП " )); } //AdcSettings( m_hAdc, 0, _BRDC("FM214X250M0"), fname ); //AdcSettings( m_hAdc, 0, _BRDC("FM214X250M0"), _BRDC("\\exam_adc.ini") ); char fname1[512]; sprintf( fname1, "\\%s", fname ); #ifdef UNICODE BRDCHAR _fname[512]; MultiByteToWideChar( CP_ACP, // __in UINT CodePage, MB_PRECOMPOSED, // __in DWORD dwFlags, fname1, // __in LPCSTR lpMultiByteStr, -1, // __in int cbMultiByte, _fname, // __out LPWSTR lpWideCharStr, 512 // __in int cchWideChar ); AdcSettings( m_hAdc, 0, _srvName, _fname ); #else AdcSettings( m_hAdc, 0, srvName, fname1 ); //AdcSettings( m_hAdc, 0, srvName, "\\exam_adc.ini" ); #endif } void TF_TestStrm::RestartAdc( void ) { /* pBrd->RegPokeInd( rd0.trd, 0, 0 ); pBrd->RegPokeInd( 4, 0, 0 ); Sleep( 100 ); pBrd->RegPokeInd( rd0.trd, 0, 2 ); pBrd->RegPokeInd( 4, 0, 2 ); Sleep( 100 ); pBrd->RegPokeInd( rd0.trd, 0, 0 ); pBrd->RegPokeInd( 4, 0, 0 ); pBrd->StreamStop( rd0.Strm ); Sleep( 100 ); pBrd->StreamStart( rd0.Strm ); Sleep( 100 ); rd0.BlockRd=0; cntRestart++; pBrd->RegPokeInd( rd0.trd, 0, 0x2038 ); pBrd->RegPokeInd( 4, 0, 0x2038 ); */ pBrd->RegPokeInd( 5, 0, 0x2010 ); pBrd->RegPokeInd( 4, 0, 0x2010 ); Sleep( 100 ); pBrd->RegPokeInd( 5, 0, 0x2012 ); pBrd->RegPokeInd( 4, 0, 0x2012 ); Sleep( 100 ); pBrd->RegPokeInd( 5, 0, 0x2010 ); pBrd->RegPokeInd( 4, 0, 0x2010 ); pBrd->StreamStop( rd0.Strm ); Sleep( 100 ); pBrd->StreamStart( rd0.Strm ); Sleep( 100 ); rd0.BlockRd=0; cntRestart++; pBrd->RegPokeInd( 5, 0, 0x2038 ); //printf( "\n\n\nPress key for adc start\n" ); //getch(); pBrd->RegPokeInd( 4, 0, 0x2038 ); } //! Перезапуск тетрады void TF_TestStrm::RestartTrd( void ) { pBrd->RegPokeInd( rd0.trd, 0, 0x2010 ); pBrd->StreamStop( rd0.Strm ); Sleep( 1 ); rd0.BlockRd=0; cntRestart++; pBrd->StreamStart( rd0.Strm ); pBrd->RegPokeInd( rd0.trd, 0, 0x2038 ); } //! Перезапуск тетрады ввода и памяти void TF_TestStrm::RestartTrdAndSdram( void ) { pBrd->RegPokeInd( rd0.trd, 0, 0x2010 ); pBrd->RegPokeInd( 5, 0, 0x2010 ); pBrd->RegPokeInd( 5, 0, 0x2012 ); pBrd->StreamStop( rd0.Strm ); Sleep( 1 ); rd0.BlockRd=0; cntRestart++; pBrd->RegPokeInd( 5, 0, 0x2010 ); pBrd->StreamStart( rd0.Strm ); pBrd->RegPokeInd( 5, 0, 0x2038 ); pBrd->RegPokeInd( rd0.trd, 0, 0x2038 ); } //! Расчёт скорости приёма void TF_TestStrm::CalculateVelocity( ParamExchange* pr, U32 currentTime, U32 interval, U32 scale ) { U32 size_block = 1048576; // размер блока 1 Мбайт if( (currentTime - pr->time_last)>interval ) { float t1 = currentTime - pr->time_last; float t2 = currentTime - pr->time_start; float v = 1000.0*(pr->BlockRd-pr->BlockLast)*size_block/t1; v/=1024*1024; pr->VelocityCurrent=v*scale; v = 1000.0*(pr->BlockRd)*size_block/t2; v/=1024*1024; pr->VelocityAvarage=v*scale; pr->time_last = currentTime; pr->BlockLast = pr->BlockRd; } } void TF_TestStrm::PrepareSwitch( void ) { U32 val; U32 adr_dev = 0x48; for( int ii=0; ; ii++ ) { //spd_read( 2, adr_dev, 0x80, val, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x57, 5, 0 ); printf( "%5d val= 0x%.2X \n", ii, val ); Sleep( 10 ); break; } /* spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x50, 5, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x41, 1, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x51, 5, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x41, 1, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x52, 5, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x41, 1, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x53, 5, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x41, 1, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x54, 5, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x41, 1, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x55, 5, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x41, 1, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x56, 5, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x41, 1, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x57, 5, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x41, 1, 0 ); */ spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x40, 0x50, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x40, 0x51, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x40, 0x52, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x40, 0x53, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x40, 0x54, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x40, 0x55, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x40, 0x56, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x40, 0x57, 0 ); for( int ii=0x50; ii<0x5C; ii++ ) { spd_read( 2, adr_dev, ii, val, 0 ); printf( " 0x%.2X: 0x%.2X\n", ii, val ); } } \n\n") );
3726 
3727  m_pFDSP->ShowInfo();
3728  m_pFDSP->ShowCalcInfo();
3729 
3730 
3731 }
3732 
3733 //! Получение одного слова из памяти результата
3734 U32 TF_TestStrm::GetTestCurrentItem( U32 adr, U32 reg )
3735 {
3736  U32 adr_r=adr+1;
3737  U32 d, dx, d0, d1, ii;
3738  for( ii=0; ii<100; ii++ )
3739  {
3740  pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, adr, reg );
3741  d0=pBrd->RegPeekInd( 8, adr_r ) & 0xFFFF;;
3742  pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, adr, reg+1 );
3743  d1=pBrd->RegPeekInd( 8, adr_r ) & 0xFFFF;;
3744  d=(d1<<16) | d0;
3745  pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, adr, reg );
3746  d0=pBrd->RegPeekInd( 8, adr_r ) & 0xFFFF;;
3747  pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, adr, reg+1);
3748  d1=pBrd->RegPeekInd( 8, adr_r ) & 0xFFFF;;
3749  dx=(d1<<16) | d0;
3750  if( d==dx )
3751  break;
3752  }
3753  return dx;
3754 
3755 }
3756 
3757 //! Текущие результаты тестирования SDRAM
3758 void TF_TestStrm::GetTestCurrent( ParamExchange *p, U32 adr )
3759 {
3760 
3761  p->BlockRd=GetTestCurrentItem( adr, 0x4000 );
3762  p->BlockOk=GetTestCurrentItem( adr, 0x4002 );
3763  p->BlockError=GetTestCurrentItem( adr, 0x4004 );
3764  p->BlockWr=GetTestCurrentItem( adr, 0x4006 );
3765 
3766 }
3767 
3768 
3769 //! Запуск теста SDRAM
3770 void TF_TestStrm::Sdram0Start( void )
3771 {
3772 
3773  pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, 0x3C6, 0 );
3774  U32 size = m_pFDSP->GetSodimmSize( 0 );
3775  pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, 0x3C7, size );
3776  //pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, 0x3C7, 4 ); // 1 - 1 Гбайт, 2 - 2 Гбайта
3777 
3778  pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, 0x3C4, 0 ); // 1 - 1 Гбайт, 2 - 2 Гбайта
3779  pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, 0x3C5, 0 ); // 1 - 1 Гбайт, 2 - 2 Гбайта
3780 
3781 
3782  pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, 0x3C0, 0x01 );
3783  Sleep( 1 );
3784  pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, 0x3C0, 0x00 );
3785  Sleep( 1 );
3786  pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, 0x3C0, 0x01 );
3787  Sleep( 1 );
3788  pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, 0x3C0, 0x00 );
3789  Sleep( 1 );
3790  pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, 0x3C0, 0x30 );
3791 
3792 }
3793 
3794 //! Запуск теста SDRAM
3795 void TF_TestStrm::Sdram1Start( void )
3796 {
3797 
3798  pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, 0x3D6, 0 );
3799  U32 size = m_pFDSP->GetSodimmSize( 1 );
3800  pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, 0x3D7, size );
3801  //pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, 0x3D7, 1 ); // 1 - 1 Гбайт, 2 - 2 Гбайта
3802 
3803 
3804  pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, 0x3D4, 0 );
3805  pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, 0x3D5, 0 ); // 1 - 1 Гбайт, 2 - 2 Гбайта
3806 
3807  pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, 0x3D0, 0x01 );
3808  Sleep( 1 );
3809  pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, 0x3D0, 0x00 );
3810  Sleep( 1 );
3811  pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, 0x3D0, 0x01 );
3812  Sleep( 1 );
3813  pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, 0x3D0, 0x00 );
3814  Sleep( 1 );
3815  pBrd->RegPokeInd( 8, 0x3D0, 0x30 );
3816 
3817 }
3818 
3819 
3820 //! Получение результатов теста␀
3821 void TF_TestStrm::GetTestResult( U32 adr )
3822 {
3823  BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\nСписок ошибок 0: \n") );
3824  GetTestResultChn( adr, 0 );
3825 
3826  BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\nСписок ошибок 1: \n") );
3827  GetTestResultChn( adr, 1 );
3828 
3829  BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\nСписок ошибок 2: \n") );
3830  GetTestResultChn( adr, 2 );
3831 
3832  BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\nСписок ошибок 3: \n") );
3833  GetTestResultChn( adr, 3 );
3834 }
3835 
3836 //! Получение результатов теста␀lt
3837 void TF_TestStrm::GetTestResultChn( U32 adr, U32 chn )
3838 {
3839  U32 base=chn*0x1000;
3840  U32 total_err;
3841  total_err=GetTestCurrentItem( adr, base+0x100 );
3842  U32 cnt=total_err;
3843  if( cnt>16 )
3844  cnt=16;
3845 
3846  U32 ii;
3847  U32 word;
3848  for( ii=0; ii<cnt; ii++ )
3849  {
3850  word=base+ii*0x10;
3851  unsigned __int64 data_rd, data_expect, tmp;
3852  U32 index, block;
3853  data_rd = GetTestCurrentItem( adr, word+0 );
3854  tmp =GetTestCurrentItem( adr, word+2 );
3855  data_rd |= tmp << 32;
3856 
3857  data_expect = GetTestCurrentItem( adr, word+4 );
3858  tmp =GetTestCurrentItem( adr, word+6 );
3859  data_expect |= tmp << 32;
3860 
3861  index = GetTestCurrentItem( adr, word+8 ) & 0xFFFF;
3862 
3863  block = GetTestCurrentItem( adr, word+9 );
3864 
3865  tmp = data_expect ^ data_rd;
3866  printf( "ERROR: %4d block: %-4d index: %.8X expect: %.16I64X receive: %.16I64X xor: %.16I64X \r\n",
3867  ii, block, index, data_expect, data_rd, tmp );
3868  }
3869 
3870 
3871 
3872 }
3873 
3874 
3875 //! Подготовка FM214x250M
3876 void TF_TestStrm::PrepareAdc( char* fname )
3877 {
3878  U32 atr;
3879 
3880  BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\nФайл инициализации АЦП: ") );
3881  printf( "%s \n", fname );
3882  char srvName[210];
3883  char srvName1[210];
3884 
3885  srvName[0]=0;
3886 
3887  {
3888  // Определение имени службы АЦП␀ FILE *in = fopen( fname, "rt" ); if( NULL==in ) { throw( _BRDC("Ошибка при открытии файла") ); } char str[512]; for( ; ; ) { if( fgets( str, 200, in )==NULL ) break; if( strncmp( "AdcServiceName=", str, 15 )==0 ) { sscanf( str+15, "%s", srvName ); break; } } sprintf( srvName1, "%s0", srvName ); } #ifdef UNICODE BRDCHAR _srvName[512]; BRDCHAR _srvName1[512]; MultiByteToWideChar( CP_ACP, // __in UINT CodePage, MB_PRECOMPOSED, // __in DWORD dwFlags, srvName, // __in LPCSTR lpMultiByteStr, -1, // __in int cbMultiByte, _srvName, // __out LPWSTR lpWideCharStr, 512 // __in int cchWideChar ); MultiByteToWideChar( CP_ACP, // __in UINT CodePage, MB_PRECOMPOSED, // __in DWORD dwFlags, srvName1, // __in LPCSTR lpMultiByteStr, -1, // __in int cbMultiByte, _srvName1, // __out LPWSTR lpWideCharStr, 512 // __in int cchWideChar ); m_hAdc=pBrd->GetSrvHandle( _srvName1, &atr ); #else m_hAdc=pBrd->GetSrvHandle( srvName1, &atr ); #endif BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\n#####Служба АЦП: %s %.8X \n"), srvName1, m_hAdc ); //m_hAdc=pBrd->GetSrvHandle( _BRDC("FM214X250M0"), &atr ); if( !m_hAdc ) { throw( _BRDC("Служба АЦП не найдена ") ); } BRDC_printf( _BRDC("\nСлужба АЦП: %.8X \n"), m_hAdc ); if( NULL==fname ) { throw( _BRDC( "Не задано имя файла инициализации АЦП " )); } //AdcSettings( m_hAdc, 0, _BRDC("FM214X250M0"), fname ); //AdcSettings( m_hAdc, 0, _BRDC("FM214X250M0"), _BRDC("\\exam_adc.ini") ); char fname1[512]; sprintf( fname1, "\\%s", fname ); #ifdef UNICODE BRDCHAR _fname[512]; MultiByteToWideChar( CP_ACP, // __in UINT CodePage, MB_PRECOMPOSED, // __in DWORD dwFlags, fname1, // __in LPCSTR lpMultiByteStr, -1, // __in int cbMultiByte, _fname, // __out LPWSTR lpWideCharStr, 512 // __in int cchWideChar ); AdcSettings( m_hAdc, 0, _srvName, _fname ); #else AdcSettings( m_hAdc, 0, srvName, fname1 ); //AdcSettings( m_hAdc, 0, srvName, "\\exam_adc.ini" ); #endif } void TF_TestStrm::RestartAdc( void ) { /* pBrd->RegPokeInd( rd0.trd, 0, 0 ); pBrd->RegPokeInd( 4, 0, 0 ); Sleep( 100 ); pBrd->RegPokeInd( rd0.trd, 0, 2 ); pBrd->RegPokeInd( 4, 0, 2 ); Sleep( 100 ); pBrd->RegPokeInd( rd0.trd, 0, 0 ); pBrd->RegPokeInd( 4, 0, 0 ); pBrd->StreamStop( rd0.Strm ); Sleep( 100 ); pBrd->StreamStart( rd0.Strm ); Sleep( 100 ); rd0.BlockRd=0; cntRestart++; pBrd->RegPokeInd( rd0.trd, 0, 0x2038 ); pBrd->RegPokeInd( 4, 0, 0x2038 ); */ pBrd->RegPokeInd( 5, 0, 0x2010 ); pBrd->RegPokeInd( 4, 0, 0x2010 ); Sleep( 100 ); pBrd->RegPokeInd( 5, 0, 0x2012 ); pBrd->RegPokeInd( 4, 0, 0x2012 ); Sleep( 100 ); pBrd->RegPokeInd( 5, 0, 0x2010 ); pBrd->RegPokeInd( 4, 0, 0x2010 ); pBrd->StreamStop( rd0.Strm ); Sleep( 100 ); pBrd->StreamStart( rd0.Strm ); Sleep( 100 ); rd0.BlockRd=0; cntRestart++; pBrd->RegPokeInd( 5, 0, 0x2038 ); //printf( "\n\n\nPress key for adc start\n" ); //getch(); pBrd->RegPokeInd( 4, 0, 0x2038 ); } //! Перезапуск тетрады void TF_TestStrm::RestartTrd( void ) { pBrd->RegPokeInd( rd0.trd, 0, 0x2010 ); pBrd->StreamStop( rd0.Strm ); Sleep( 1 ); rd0.BlockRd=0; cntRestart++; pBrd->StreamStart( rd0.Strm ); pBrd->RegPokeInd( rd0.trd, 0, 0x2038 ); } //! Перезапуск тетрады ввода и памяти void TF_TestStrm::RestartTrdAndSdram( void ) { pBrd->RegPokeInd( rd0.trd, 0, 0x2010 ); pBrd->RegPokeInd( 5, 0, 0x2010 ); pBrd->RegPokeInd( 5, 0, 0x2012 ); pBrd->StreamStop( rd0.Strm ); Sleep( 1 ); rd0.BlockRd=0; cntRestart++; pBrd->RegPokeInd( 5, 0, 0x2010 ); pBrd->StreamStart( rd0.Strm ); pBrd->RegPokeInd( 5, 0, 0x2038 ); pBrd->RegPokeInd( rd0.trd, 0, 0x2038 ); } //! Расчёт скорости приёма void TF_TestStrm::CalculateVelocity( ParamExchange* pr, U32 currentTime, U32 interval, U32 scale ) { U32 size_block = 1048576; // размер блока 1 Мбайт if( (currentTime - pr->time_last)>interval ) { float t1 = currentTime - pr->time_last; float t2 = currentTime - pr->time_start; float v = 1000.0*(pr->BlockRd-pr->BlockLast)*size_block/t1; v/=1024*1024; pr->VelocityCurrent=v*scale; v = 1000.0*(pr->BlockRd)*size_block/t2; v/=1024*1024; pr->VelocityAvarage=v*scale; pr->time_last = currentTime; pr->BlockLast = pr->BlockRd; } } void TF_TestStrm::PrepareSwitch( void ) { U32 val; U32 adr_dev = 0x48; for( int ii=0; ; ii++ ) { //spd_read( 2, adr_dev, 0x80, val, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x57, 5, 0 ); printf( "%5d val= 0x%.2X \n", ii, val ); Sleep( 10 ); break; } /* spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x50, 5, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x41, 1, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x51, 5, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x41, 1, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x52, 5, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x41, 1, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x53, 5, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x41, 1, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x54, 5, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x41, 1, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x55, 5, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x41, 1, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x56, 5, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x41, 1, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x57, 5, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x41, 1, 0 ); */ spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x40, 0x50, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x40, 0x51, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x40, 0x52, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x40, 0x53, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x40, 0x54, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x40, 0x55, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x40, 0x56, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x40, 0x57, 0 ); for( int ii=0x50; ii<0x5C; ii++ ) { spd_read( 2, adr_dev, ii, val, 0 ); printf( " 0x%.2X: 0x%.2X\n", ii, val ); } }

3890  if( NULL==in )

4033 //! Перезапуск тетрады␀
4034 void TF_TestStrm::RestartTrd( void )
4035 {
4036  pBrd->RegPokeInd( rd0.trd, 0, 0x2010 );
4037  pBrd->StreamStop( rd0.Strm );
4038  Sleep( 1 );
4039 
4040  rd0.BlockRd=0;
4041  cntRestart++;
4042 
4043  pBrd->StreamStart( rd0.Strm );
4044  pBrd->RegPokeInd( rd0.trd, 0, 0x2038 );
4045 }

4047 //! Перезапуск тетрады ввода и памяти
4048 void TF_TestStrm::RestartTrdAndSdram( void )
4049 {
4050  pBrd->RegPokeInd( rd0.trd, 0, 0x2010 );
4051  pBrd->RegPokeInd( 5, 0, 0x2010 );
4052  pBrd->RegPokeInd( 5, 0, 0x2012 );
4053  pBrd->StreamStop( rd0.Strm );
4054  Sleep( 1 );
4055 
4056  rd0.BlockRd=0;
4057  cntRestart++;
4058  pBrd->RegPokeInd( 5, 0, 0x2010 );
4059 
4060  pBrd->StreamStart( rd0.Strm );
4061  pBrd->RegPokeInd( 5, 0, 0x2038 );
4062  pBrd->RegPokeInd( rd0.trd, 0, 0x2038 );
4063 }

4065 
4066 //! Расчёт скорости приёма
4067 void TF_TestStrm::CalculateVelocity( ParamExchange* pr, U32 currentTime, U32 interval, U32 scale )
4068 {
4069 
4070  U32 size_block = 1048576; // размер блока 1 Мбайт␀ if( (currentTime - pr->time_last)>interval ) { float t1 = currentTime - pr->time_last; float t2 = currentTime - pr->time_start; float v = 1000.0*(pr->BlockRd-pr->BlockLast)*size_block/t1; v/=1024*1024; pr->VelocityCurrent=v*scale; v = 1000.0*(pr->BlockRd)*size_block/t2; v/=1024*1024; pr->VelocityAvarage=v*scale; pr->time_last = currentTime; pr->BlockLast = pr->BlockRd; } } void TF_TestStrm::PrepareSwitch( void ) { U32 val; U32 adr_dev = 0x48; for( int ii=0; ; ii++ ) { //spd_read( 2, adr_dev, 0x80, val, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x57, 5, 0 ); printf( "%5d val= 0x%.2X \n", ii, val ); Sleep( 10 ); break; } /* spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x50, 5, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x41, 1, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x51, 5, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x41, 1, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x52, 5, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x41, 1, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x53, 5, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x41, 1, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x54, 5, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x41, 1, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x55, 5, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x41, 1, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x56, 5, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x41, 1, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x57, 5, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x41, 1, 0 ); */ spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x40, 0x50, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x40, 0x51, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x40, 0x52, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x40, 0x53, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x40, 0x54, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x40, 0x55, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x40, 0x56, 0 ); spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x40, 0x57, 0 ); for( int ii=0x50; ii<0x5C; ii++ ) { spd_read( 2, adr_dev, ii, val, 0 ); printf( " 0x%.2X: 0x%.2X\n", ii, val ); } }
4071 
4072  if( (currentTime - pr->time_last)>interval )
4073  {
4074  float t1 = currentTime - pr->time_last;
4075  float t2 = currentTime - pr->time_start;
4076  float v = 1000.0*(pr->BlockRd-pr->BlockLast)*size_block/t1;
4077  v/=1024*1024;
4078  pr->VelocityCurrent=v*scale;
4079 
4080  v = 1000.0*(pr->BlockRd)*size_block/t2;
4081  v/=1024*1024;
4082  pr->VelocityAvarage=v*scale;
4083  pr->time_last = currentTime;
4084  pr->BlockLast = pr->BlockRd;
4085 
4086  }
4087 }
4088 
4089 
4090 void TF_TestStrm::PrepareSwitch( void )
4091 {
4092 
4093  U32 val;
4094  U32 adr_dev = 0x48;
4095  for( int ii=0; ; ii++ )
4096  {
4097  //spd_read( 2, adr_dev, 0x80, val, 0 );
4098  spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x57, 5, 0 );
4099  printf( "%5d val= 0x%.2X \n", ii, val );
4100  Sleep( 10 );
4101  break;
4102  }
4103  /*
4104  spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x50, 5, 0 );
4105  spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x41, 1, 0 );
4106 
4107  spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x51, 5, 0 );
4108  spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x41, 1, 0 );
4109 
4110  spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x52, 5, 0 );
4111  spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x41, 1, 0 );
4112 
4113  spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x53, 5, 0 );
4114  spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x41, 1, 0 );
4115 
4116  spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x54, 5, 0 );
4117  spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x41, 1, 0 );
4118 
4119  spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x55, 5, 0 );
4120  spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x41, 1, 0 );
4121 
4122  spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x56, 5, 0 );
4123  spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x41, 1, 0 );
4124 
4125 
4126  spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x57, 5, 0 );
4127  spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x41, 1, 0 );
4128  */
4129 
4130  spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x40, 0x50, 0 );
4131  spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x40, 0x51, 0 );
4132  spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x40, 0x52, 0 );
4133  spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x40, 0x53, 0 );
4134  spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x40, 0x54, 0 );
4135  spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x40, 0x55, 0 );
4136  spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x40, 0x56, 0 );
4137  spd_write( 2, adr_dev, 0x40, 0x57, 0 );
4138 
4139  for( int ii=0x50; ii<0x5C; ii++ )
4140  {
4141  spd_read( 2, adr_dev, ii, val, 0 );
4142  printf( " 0x%.2X: 0x%.2X\n", ii, val );
4143  }
4144 
4145 }
TF_TestStrm::SdramTimeWr
float SdramTimeWr
Время заполнения активной зоны
Definition: TF_TestStrm.h:169
